snippet: The Look-Up Line is a 40-inch-wide orange strip around the perimeter of the rink that is designed to reduce paralyzing neck injuries.
abstract: USA Hockey, sport’s governing body in the United States, announces that it has endorsed use of the Look-Up Line, orange warning track painted on the ice designed to reduce paralyzing neck injuries that could result from collisions into the boards; measure falls short of mandating its use in American ice rinks.
lead_paragraph: The Look-Up Line is a 40-inch-wide orange strip around the perimeter of the rink that is designed to reduce paralyzing neck injuries.

headline.main: USA Hockey Permits Use of Safety Feature Resembling Warning Track
